duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide nursing care to neuroscience patients with neurological disorders and post neurosurgical cases.
Work collaboratively as part of a dynamic multidisciplinary team to provide high-quality and evidence-based care.
Perform patient assessments and critical care interventions as needed.
Participate in acuity-based staffing to ensure optimal safety for patients.
Engage in patient education and support for patients and their families.
Adhere to shared governance structure and contribute to a positive work environment.
